scripts.postinstall: cd ui5-service-worker && npm install && cd ../openui5-sample-app && npm install
scripts.start: cd openui5-sample-app && npm run start -- --h2 --o index.html
scripts.start-dist: cd openui5-sample-app && npm run build && npm run serve-dist -- --port 8080
scripts.start-dist-self-contained: cd openui5-sample-app && npm run build-self-contained && npm run serve-dist -- --port 8080
